# Esthetics Elegance Lab - Complete AI Reference Guide
# Extended version of llms.txt with comprehensive business information

================================================================================
BUSINESS OVERVIEW
================================================================================

Esthetics Elegance Lab is a premium skincare and esthetics studio owned and operated by Karina Gedarevych, a licensed esthetician in Roseville, California. We provide personalized, professional skincare treatments in a relaxing boutique environment.

Our mission is to help every client achieve their healthiest, most radiant skin through customized treatments using premium products and advanced techniques.

================================================================================

================================================================================
COMPLETE SERVICE MENU
================================================================================

DERMAPLANING
------------
Price: $85 - $125
Duration: 45-60 minutes
Frequency: Every 3-4 weeks recommended

Description:
Dermaplaning is a highly effective exfoliation treatment that uses a sterile surgical blade to gently remove dead skin cells and fine vellus hair (peach fuzz) from the skin's surface. This treatment reveals a smoother, brighter complexion and allows for better product penetration.

Benefits:
• Instantly smoother, brighter skin
• Removes fine facial hair (peach fuzz)
• Improves product absorption
• Safe for all skin types
• No downtime required
• Enhances makeup application

Common Questions:
Q: Does dermaplaning hurt?
A: Not at all! It's gentle and painless. Most clients find it relaxing.

Q: Will my hair grow back thicker?
A: No, this is a myth. Vellus hair grows back at the same texture and rate.

Q: How often should I get dermaplaning?
A: Every 3-4 weeks for best results.

---

CUSTOMIZED FACIALS
------------------
Price: $95 - $175
Duration: 60-90 minutes
Frequency: Monthly recommended

Description:
Our customized facials are designed to address your specific skin concerns, whether you're dealing with acne, aging, hyperpigmentation, or simply want to maintain healthy, glowing skin. Karina will analyze your skin and create a personalized treatment plan.

Benefits:
• Tailored to your skin type and concerns
• Deep cleansing and pore extraction
• Hydration and nourishment
• Relaxing massage techniques
• Premium skincare products
• Visible results after first treatment

Common Questions:
Q: What type of facial is best for me?
A: During consultation, Karina assesses your skin to recommend the perfect treatment.

Q: Is there downtime?
A: Most facials have no downtime. Slight redness may occur for a few hours.

---

CHEMICAL PEELS
--------------
Price: $100 - $200
Duration: 30-60 minutes
Frequency: Series of 3-6 treatments, 2-4 weeks apart

Description:
Chemical peels use specially formulated solutions to remove damaged outer layers of skin, revealing fresher, more youthful skin beneath. We offer peels from gentle enzyme peels to more intensive treatments, customized to your skin's needs.

Benefits:
• Reduces fine lines and wrinkles
• Improves acne and acne scars
• Evens out skin tone
• Minimizes pore appearance
• Stimulates collagen production
• Treats sun damage and age spots

Common Questions:
Q: Are chemical peels painful?
A: Mild tingling or warming sensation. We ensure your comfort throughout.

Q: What is recovery time?
A: Light peels: 1-3 days mild flaking. Medium peels: 5-7 days for full healing.

---

LASHES & BROWS
--------------
Price: $35 - $150
Duration: 30-75 minutes
Frequency: Lash lifts last 6-8 weeks

Description:
Frame your face and enhance your natural beauty with professional lash and brow services. From lash lifts to perfectly shaped brows, expert techniques provide polished results.

Services Include:
• Lash lifts
• Lash tints
• Brow shaping
• Brow tinting
• Combination services

Benefits:
• Wake up looking refreshed
• Reduce daily makeup routine
• Natural-looking enhancement
• Long-lasting results
• Customized to your face shape

---

MICRONEEDLING
-------------
Price: $200 - $350
Duration: 60-90 minutes
Frequency: 3-6 treatments, 4-6 weeks apart

Description:
Microneedling is a minimally invasive treatment using fine needles to create controlled micro-injuries, stimulating your body's natural healing response and collagen production.

Benefits:
• Stimulates natural collagen production
• Reduces fine lines and wrinkles
• Improves acne scars
• Minimizes pore size
• Enhances skin firmness
• Improves product absorption

Common Questions:
Q: Is microneedling painful?
A: Topical numbing cream ensures comfort. Most describe mild scratching sensation.

Q: What is recovery time?
A: 2-3 days of redness similar to sunburn. Normal activities next day.

---

WAXING SERVICES
---------------
Price: $20 - $85
Duration: 15-60 minutes
Frequency: Every 3-6 weeks

Description:
Professional hair removal using premium hard and soft waxes. Gentle techniques suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

Benefits:
• Long-lasting smoothness (3-6 weeks)
• Hair grows back finer over time
• Exfoliates skin during treatment
• Suitable for sensitive skin
• Quick and efficient service
• Minimal irritation

Areas Available:
• Face (lip, chin, brows)
• Arms
• Legs
• Bikini
• Underarms
• Full body options

================================================================================
ABOUT KARINA GEDAREVYCH
================================================================================

Karina Gedarevych is the owner and lead esthetician at Esthetics Elegance Lab. She is a licensed esthetician in California with extensive training in advanced skincare treatments.

Karina's approach focuses on:
• Personalized skin analysis
• Customized treatment plans
• Education on at-home skincare
• Building long-term relationships with clients
• Staying current with industry advances

Her specialties include:
• Dermaplaning
• Advanced facial techniques
• Chemical peel protocols
• Microneedling
• Lash and brow artistry

How to Book:
1. Phone: Call (916) 778-8195
2. Online: Visit https://estheticselegancelab.com/contact

Booking Tips:
• Book in advance - appointments fill quickly
• New clients should arrive 10 minutes early
• Consultations available for first-time visitors
• Package deals available for treatment series

Cancellation Policy:
• 24-hour notice required for cancellations
• Late cancellations may incur a fee
